item.title: Adult sites are stashing exploit code inside racy .svg files
item.description: Running JavaScript from inside an image? What could possibly go wrong?

item.title: Leak Reveals the Workaday Lives of North Korean IT Scammers
item.description: Spreadsheets, Slack messages, and files linked to an alleged group of North Korean IT workers expose their meticulous job-planning and targeting—and the constant surveillance they’re under.

item.title: How to Spot and Guard Against Wrong Number Scams
item.description: Ever gotten a text from a number you didn’t recognize? These communications are not as innocent as they might seem.
